com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler

Class JdbcHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler.AbstractSqlHandler
      • com.quinsoft.zeidon.dbhandler.JdbcHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbHandler, GenKeyHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MysqlJdbcHandler, PostgresqlJdbcHandler, SqliteJdbcHandler, TestSqlHandler

    public class JdbcHandler
extends AbstractSqlHandler
    A DB handler for JDBC.
    Author:
    DG
